description: carved fetish; standing with the arms disapperaing into the mass of fetish composition about the body; with a string of glass beads, a bell and dried seed pod suspended; ringed neck; large eyes; copper tacks covering the head; whitened surface with an oily patina in parts
medium: hard wood, vegetable fibre, animal skin, blue glass beads, dried seed pod, metal bell, copper tacks covering the head, whitened surface with oily patina in parts
title: Fetish with Ringed Neck
